_source.short_desc: FreeConferenceCall.com offers HD audio conferencing and online meetings for up to 1,000 participants  all for free.
_source.long_desc: FreeConferenceCall.com offers HD audio conferencing and online meetings with screen sharing and video conferencing for up to 1,000 participants. Hosting more than 40 million conferences annually, FreeConferenceCall.com has grown to become the largest and most recognized conferencing provider on the planet. Every account includes unlimited conference calls, screen sharing, video conferencing, recording, security features, calendar integrations, mobile applications and much more  all for free.
_source.pricing_details: FreeConferenceCall.com is available for free. Users can get one number with contribution of $4 or more.
_source.target_audience: FreeConferenceCall.com is the most recognized conferencing brand in the world with users in more than 800,000 businesses, including nearly all Fortune 500 companies.

category_features.name: Electronic Hand Raising
category_features.definition: Participants can alert the Host that they have a question when they are muted.

category_features.name: HD Audio/Video
category_features.definition: High-definition audio capability

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: On-Demand Webcasting
category_features.definition: An on-demand webcast is a pre-recorded presentation, which is available online at the viewer?s convenience.

category_features.name: Presentation Streaming
category_features.definition: Stream slide presentations during the web conference to present it to the audience

category_features.name: Presentation Tools
category_features.definition: Share and present designs

category_features.name: Private Chat
category_features.definition: Send text messages to selected individual(s) from the entire audience

category_features.name: Real-Time Chat
category_features.definition: Engage in direct, instant messaging

category_features.name: Recording
category_features.definition: Record live video calls to play later

category_features.name: Screen Sharing
category_features.definition: Digitally share screen view with others

category_features.name: Two Way Audio & Video
category_features.definition: Presenter can see and hear participants and vice versa.

category_features.name: Video Conferencing
category_features.definition: Adds audio/visual capabilities for remote learners and instructors

category_features.name: Brainstorming
category_features.definition: Group collaboration to solve ideas in a productive and concentrated manner.

category_features.name: Calendar Management
category_features.definition: Create, manage, and share multiple calendars

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: Content Management
category_features.definition: Creating, updating, monitoring accuracy, and ensuring brand consistency for all written materials that are distributed to stakeholders.

category_features.name: Discussions / Forums
category_features.definition: Online forums/groups where users can ask questions, share ideas, best practices, etc.

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Real Time Editing
category_features.definition: Preview and make real-time changes in content

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Version Control
category_features.definition: Track revisions and updates to collateral, and navigate between versions of the same documentation

category_features.name: Video Conferencing
category_features.definition: Adds audio/visual capabilities for remote learners and instructors

category_features.name: Internal Meetings
category_features.definition: For use in meetings within the company

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

related_products.short_desc: Slack brings all your communication together in one place. It's real-time messaging, archiving and search for modern teams.
related_products.features: Slack is a collaboration hub, where the right people and the right information come together, helping everyone get work done. When your team needs to kick off a project, hire a new employee, deploy some code, review a sales contract, finalize next year's budget, measure an A/B test, plan your next office opening, and more, Slack has you covered. Try Slack with your team for free.

related_products.short_desc: Zoom Meetings are easy, reliable, and secure, providing HD video, audio, and content sharing across a multitude of systems.
related_products.features: Zoom Meetings are easy, reliable, and secure, providing HD video, audio, and content sharing across everything from your mobile and desktop devices to telephones and conference room systems. Special features include cloud and local recording with transcripts and multi-user annotation capabilities via screen share.  Easy access with one click, chat across platforms and share files all with encrypted, compliant settings for extra security.

related_products.short_desc: Fast, easy and reliable online meeting software trusted by millions of people everyday for real-time virtual communication.
related_products.features: An industry leader in online video conferencing for companies around the world, GoTo Meeting now comes as part of GoTo Connect, the all-in-one communications software built for SMBs. Get a fast, easy and reliable professional solution that enables customers to meet face to face, connect with colleagues through in-meeting chat or conference calling, and screenshare their presentations, all with the click of a button. The Meeting solution from GoTo Connect pairs productivity with flexibility.

related_products.short_desc: Webex brings together Calling, Meeting and Messaging modes of collaboration into a seamless, inclusive and intelligent experience.
related_products.features:
Webex brings together Calling, Meeting and Messaging modes of collaboration into a seamless, inclusive and intelligent experience.

Make meetings more interactive and engaging
-	Reduce disruptions with background noise removal and voice enhancement
-	Enable audiences to share their reactions with animated emojis and gesture recognition
-	Improve audience engagement with next-gen dynamic polling and Q&A by Slido
-	Customize the stage layout to focus on the content and people that matters most

related_products.short_desc: Ridiculously simple screen sharing tool for meetings on the fly. Get everybody on the same page, when they're not in the same room!
related_products.features: join.me is the fastest and easiest way to connect and collaborate. Anyone can share ideas instantly with screen sharing, audio, video, whiteboard and chat. join.me is a personalized meeting experience where users can personalize participant bubbles, URLs, backgrounds and more!

related_products.short_desc: Web conferencing tool that helps businesses with instant messaging, voice & video calls, voice messaging, desktop sharing, conferencing
related_products.features: Web conferencing tool that helps businesses with instant messaging, voice & video calls, voice messaging, desktop sharing, conferencing. Designed for midsize to large businesses in consulting, finance, healthcare, and other industries, it is a web conferencing tool that provides team messaging, remote collaboration, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Workplace connects everyone in an organization using familiar Facebook features like chat, video calling, posts and groups.
related_products.features: Workplace connects everyone in an organization using familiar Facebook features like Chat, video calling, posts and Groups. It integrates with the business tools you already use and provides a simple, secure and more productive way for people to share knowledge, work together and build connected communities.

related_products.short_desc: Securely share presentations and multimedia right from your desktop, and get feedback from hundreds of participants.
related_products.features: Communicate your ideas powerfully using Adobe Connect web conferencing software. Securely share presentations and multimedia right from your desktop, and get feedback from hundreds of participants - all using a web browser and the Adobe Flash Player runtime, already installed on 98% of Internet-connected personal computers.

related_products.short_desc:
BlueJeans is the meetings platform for the modern workplace.
Simple. Smart. Trusted.
related_products.features:
BlueJeans is the meetings platform for the modern workplace. We bring video, audio and web conferencing together with the collaboration tools people use every day.

The first cloud service to connect desktops, mobile devices and room systems in one video meeting, BlueJeans makes meetings fast to join and simple to use, so people can work productively where and how they want.

It is the meeting solution teams trust to do their best work.

related_products.short_desc: Built for learning, our fully redesigned web conferencing solution allows employees to fulfill training requirements anywhere, anytime.
related_products.features: Focused on education and training, Blackboard Collaborate is designed for simplicity, accessibility and to support education and training workflows. Whether it's an online meeting, virtual group training, or connecting remote employees, our one-click virtual training solution offers a level of connection and engagement that makes learners forget that they're not in a physical space.

related_products.short_desc: NO PINS. NO DOWNLOADS. NO PROBLEM.
related_products.features: Dialpad Meetings changed online meetings forever by killing PINs and making it simple for people to join. With powerful call controls, seamless screen sharing, and HD calls and video, its easier than ever to stay connected no matter where work finds you.

similar_products.short_desc: ConveneAGM is the AGM solution that enables you to conduct virtual or hybrid shareholder meetings in compliance to existing guidelines.
similar_products.features: ConveneAGM is the end-to-end eAGM conference solution designed to conduct engaging virtual or hybrid shareholder meetings. Organizations can hold a real-time AGM broadcast where shareholders can register, vote on resolutions, send proxy forms, and participate in live Q&A. It streamlines the AGM process and requirements into an all-in-one platform to aid secretaries, scrutineers, and share registrars. ConveneAGM is developed by Azeus, a CMMI Level 5 company and an expert in process efficiency.

similar_products.short_desc: TrainerCentral is an online course platform, with an in-build video conferencing functionality to host webinars and live workshops.
similar_products.features: Turn learning into a two-way street by simulating an in-person environment with a host of engagement features and tools. TrainerCentral's virtual classroom streams your training videos in HD, engaging your remote learners like you're standing right in front of them.

similar_products.short_desc: Fast, simple, and secure co-browsing and collaboration technology that lets you upgrade any conversation, from any channel, seamlessly.
similar_products.features:
Surfly provides co-browsing and collaboration technology that lets you upgrade any conversation, from any channel, seamlessly, and support customers as if you are sitting side-by-side. 

Surfly is easily customized to fit any customer experience flow. You can launch co-browsing sessions directly from your site or platform and change look & feel so it matches your branding.

Surfly enhances interactions on your platform in real-time. Without writing a single line of code or installing software.

similar_products.short_desc: Glisser is an award-winning technology platform for virtual and hybrid meetings and events.
similar_products.features:
Glisser is an award-winning platform for virtual and hybrid meetings and events. We enable companies to power engaging event experiences by offering a ready-to-go event platform and a completely customizable solution that lets you take control of the look and feel of your virtual events.

Glisser Elements is our platform distilled down to its purest form. Our virtual and hybrid event Software Development Kits (SDKs) allow you to create unique virtual environments, inside your own websites.

similar_products.short_desc: ClickMeeting is a browser-based webinar solution, brings the power of webinars to organizations of any size
similar_products.features: ClickMeeting is a browser-based webinar solution, brings the power of webinars to organizations of any size, from one-person firms to multinational enterprises. The web-based solution is easy to use and covers the entire webinar process from preparation to presentation, and from interaction to follow-up. The software requires no installation and works on all devices and operating systems.

similar_products.short_desc: Fast, easy and reliable online meeting software trusted by millions of people everyday for real-time virtual communication.
similar_products.features: An industry leader in online video conferencing for companies around the world, GoTo Meeting now comes as part of GoTo Connect, the all-in-one communications software built for SMBs. Get a fast, easy and reliable professional solution that enables customers to meet face to face, connect with colleagues through in-meeting chat or conference calling, and screenshare their presentations, all with the click of a button. The Meeting solution from GoTo Connect pairs productivity with flexibility.

similar_products.short_desc: BigMarker is the world's most customizable platform for webinars, virtual and hybrid events.
similar_products.features: BigMarker is a fully customizable virtual conference platform that combines powerful video technology with robust marketing and interactive experience capabilities to create unique branded virtual events.

similar_products.short_desc: A web conferencing solution that empowers you to host interactive online meeting, video conferencing and organize engaging webinars.
similar_products.features: Zoho Meeting is a robust web conferencing solution built for your online meeting and webinar needs. It is completely browser-based and attendees don't need to download any application to attend a meeting or webinar. Keep your meetings handy using the desktop plugin for Windows and Mac, iOS app, android app, Google Chrome extension, Firefox extension, embed widget and calendar integrations. Embed webinar registration, polls, Q&A, allow to talk, recording, in-depth analytics, etc

similar_products.short_desc: Slack brings all your communication together in one place. It's real-time messaging, archiving and search for modern teams.
similar_products.features: Slack is a collaboration hub, where the right people and the right information come together, helping everyone get work done. When your team needs to kick off a project, hire a new employee, deploy some code, review a sales contract, finalize next year's budget, measure an A/B test, plan your next office opening, and more, Slack has you covered. Try Slack with your team for free.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy to use, feature-rich conferencing solution. Audio, video, screen sharing and much more with up to 1,000 participants.
similar_products.features:
Grow your business with a conferencing service that doesnt limit you the bigger you get, or restrict features to make you upgrade.

With StartMeeting we give you all the conferencing and online meeting features you need right off the bat, with up to 1,000 audio, web and video participants  all for a flat rate of $12.95 a month.

similar_products.short_desc: Build every in-person, virtual, and hybrid event with Bizzabo's next-generation event management platform - The Event Experience OS.
similar_products.features: Bizzabo's next-generation event management platform powers immersive in-person, virtual, and hybrid experiences for the world's leading brands. The Bizzabo Event Experience OS is a data-rich open platform that empowers Event Experience Leaders to manage events, engage audiences, activate communities, and deliver powerful business outcomes. Bizzabo was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in New York and Tel-Aviv.

similar_products.short_desc: Jumbo is a fully integrated and customizable web conferencing and live streaming software tool.
similar_products.features: Jumbo builds the world's most customizable live streaming and video platforms. Our platforms are fully integrated and tailor made for your brand. Features include registration, ticketing, live chat, virtual breakout rooms, trivia, polls, and on-demand user data. Our full service event production team will assist you in crafting the pristine video content. Perfect for virtual events, fundraisers, online education, live streaming, hosting premium content, Learning Management System, and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Audio Conferencing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Audio Conferencing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Audio Conferencing software allows multiple people to dial in and join the same audio-only call. This type of software may also include live chat, call recording, video conferencing, and other features that enable online communication between remote teams, stakeholders, and customers.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Collaboration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Collaboration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Collaboration software enables the sharing of information by providing an online or intranet-based environment for virtual teamwork. These applications allow for greater efficiency in managing document libraries and versions, projects in progress, report editing, threaded discussions, calendar sharing, knowledge base search, workflow and task management. Collaboration solutions often feature integration for a variety of real-time communications tools including: video or voice conferencing, email and instant messaging. Collaboration software is related to Project Management software and Web Conferencing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Live Streaming software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Live Streaming tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Live Streaming software allows organizations to broadcast live event feeds over the internet and engage with their target audience.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Meeting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Meeting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Meeting software enables teams to coordinate, schedule, conduct, and participate in collaborative meetings.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Remote Work software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Remote Work tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Remote Work software includes a combination of different types of solutions needed for professionals to be efficient and effective in their role from outside a fixed office space. Collaboration and team communication are vital for productive and successful remote work professionals.  Remote Work consists of software like, Softphone, Live Chat, Web Conferencing, Collaboration, Project Management, Remote Support and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Screen Recording software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Screen Recording tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Screen Recording software allows users to take capture audio and video clips from their screens and other devices such as webcams. These media files can be edited, annotated, and converted to various formats, as well as uploaded to help businesses with training, tutorials, demos, and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Screen Sharing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Screen Sharing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Screen Sharing software allows presenters and meeting participants to share the screens of their computers with other participants' computers or with projecting devices.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Virtual Classroom software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Virtual Classroom tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Virtual Classroom Software allows teachers and instructors to engage with learners in an online setting. These products offer interactive whiteboards to share notes/lessons, attendance tracking, live chat, and breakout rooms to encourage collaboration between participants.

related_products.short_desc: RingCentral MVP provides reliable, high-quality phone service anywhere you have internet access.
related_products.features:
RingCentral VoIP (voice over internet protocol) is part of a secure, reliable cloud communications platform that eliminates the need for on-premise PBX hardware. 

With mobile apps, online meetings, and business SMS, it's more than a phone system, it's comprehensive hosted business communications at its best.

related_products.short_desc: RingCentral MVP provides reliable, high-quality phone service anywhere you have internet access.
related_products.features:
RingCentral VoIP (voice over internet protocol) is part of a secure, reliable cloud communications platform that eliminates the need for on-premise PBX hardware. 

With mobile apps, online meetings, and business SMS, it's more than a phone system, it's comprehensive hosted business communications at its best.

related_products.short_desc: Talkdesk is intuitive, cloud-based contact center software with advanced features, comprehensive reporting and seamless integrations.
related_products.features: Talkdesk is next-generation cloud-based call center software that helps you connect with your customers. The easy-to-use interface offers robust functionality with advanced features, comprehensive reporting and seamless integrations with 25+ business tools to empower sales and service teams to have personalized, effective conversations with customers.

related_products.short_desc: GoToConnect combines Jive's VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's video conferencing into one simple, reliable and flexible solution.
related_products.features: GoToConnect (formerly Jive) combines cloud VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's web, audio and video capabilities into one simple, flexible solution. Users can meet, talk, and collaborate via web browser, desktop application, or desk phone with features ranging from virtual voicemail, and call forwarding, to secure video conferencing and screen sharing. For as low as $19.95 a month, GoToConnect eliminates the hassle and expense of managing multiple collaboration solution providers.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 #1 business VoIP system used by over 8 million businessed worldwide. Cloud, mobile and open source versions available.
related_products.features: If you are looking for a free VoIP phone system for your small business, Bitrix24 is what you need. Unlike other voip solutions, Bitrix24 works both as your internal PBX system and as contact center for inbound and outbound calls. It's also the only free voip system that comes with fully featured free CRM. Importantly, when you clients call you from a phone number recorded in CRM, they will be identified, connected to assigned manager and their phone call can be logged and recorded.

related_products.short_desc: Dialpad Talk is VoIP technology built for modern businesses, putting voice, messaging, meetings, and video on any device.
related_products.features: Dialpad Talk is a modern cloud-based VoIP phone system that keeps teams connected across all their devices. Dialpad Talk's native Voice Intelligence features boost productivity with real-time transcription and post-call summaries, including highlighted action items. Plus integrations with G Suite, Office 365, OneLogin, Okta, and Salesforce create rapid deployments, easy user provisioning and automatic syncing with the apps your team uses everyday.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud Customer Service with Practical AI - Inbound, Outbound, ACD, IVR, IVA, CTI, Chat, Email, Call Recording, and CRM Integration.
related_products.features: Create personalized customer service experiences over the phone, web, chat, and more with the power of Practical AI. Our best-in-class AI automates interactions and assist your live agents, reducing service costs while you deliver a more conversational service experience. It's like having a brand new, international team that speaks hundreds of languages and streamlines your most critical business operations

related_products.short_desc: NO PINS. NO DOWNLOADS. NO PROBLEM.
related_products.features: Dialpad Meetings changed online meetings forever by killing PINs and making it simple for people to join. With powerful call controls, seamless screen sharing, and HD calls and video, its easier than ever to stay connected no matter where work finds you.

related_products.short_desc: Weave is the all-in-one customer communication and engagement platform for small business.
related_products.features: Weave is the all-in-one customer communication and engagement platform for small business. From the first phone call to the final invoice and every touchpoint in between, Weave connects the entire customer journey. Weave's software solutions transform how local businesses attract, communicate with and engage customers to grow their business.

similar_products.short_desc: Aircall is the most intuitive VoIP solution. Experience an easy set up, no hardware, and dozens of CRM integrations.
similar_products.features: Make every phone conversation count and give time back to your reps. Aircall's flexible VoIP phone solution integrates with 80+ CRM, helpdesk, and other critical business tools to surface the information your reps need to be successful, when they need it. Join 9,000+ companies that trust Aircall to strengthen their customer and prospect relationships with first-class phone features like: SMS, advanced call routing, IVR, analytics, power dialer, call tagging, and other collaborative features.

similar_products.short_desc: GoToConnect combines Jive's VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's video conferencing into one simple, reliable and flexible solution.

Users can meet, talk, and collaborate via web browser, desktop application, or desk phone with features ranging from virtual voicemail, and call forwarding, to secure video conferencing and screen sharing. For as low as $19.95 a month, GoToConnect eliminates the hassle and expense of managing multiple collaboration solution providers.

similar_products.short_desc: With SkySwitch, resellers can offer their end-users communication and collaboration services with ease even if they are not experts.
similar_products.features: SkySwitch offers the ultimate white-label UCaaS platform for MSPs, VARs, System Integrators, Interconnects and like providers to quickly brand as their own and resell to their customer base.  Get up and running selling a hybrid workforce solution -- UCaaS/hosted voice -- in as little as 90 days. Expand your service offerings and revenue stream. Our top resellers on average annualized growth rate is 40%.

similar_products.short_desc: Phone.com offers all the features of a big enterprise phone system without the cost and complexity.
similar_products.features: Phone.com provides you with Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) technology to connect your phone to an existing internet connection to make phone calls. Phone.com is the leading cloud-based phone company focused on the needs of small businesses and entrepreneurs.  In addition to offering a variety of innovative, customizable and cost-effective communications solutions, Phone.com delivers award-winning U.S. based customer support to more than 25,000 customers across America.

similar_products.short_desc: We think VoIP pricing should be simple. With InfoFloTalk you pay just $29.99 per line and get UNLIMITED extensions.
similar_products.features: We think VoIP pricing should be simple. With InfoFloTalk you pay just $29.99 per line and get UNLIMITED extensions. We are the only VoIP provider on this list who charges per line and not per extension. No hidden costs, no gimmicks. If you are currently paying per extension then you are overpaying. Sure, you could work with a bigger VoIP provider, but bigger doesn?t mean better. No one can match us head on when it comes to our superior technology or customer-first pricing model. Pay per line

similar_products.short_desc: Unlimited Voice, SMS, Fax, Chat, Video. Fully Customizable and Scalable to fit your Needs. All with our Award-winning 24/7/365 support.
similar_products.features:
ULTATEL is a recognized industry leader in business VoIP communications. With the power of cloud technology, we help businesses empower their people to be more productive and connect with their customers wherever they are.

Our plans come fully customizable and scalable with unlimited Voice, SMS, Fax, Chat, and Video.
 
As an integration pioneer, ULTATEL can do much more than build a great phone system. We can integrate with your existing systems to get you the results you want, seamlessly.

similar_products.short_desc: Get the perfect phone number for your small business and turn the world into our office with the Grasshopper virtual phone system.
similar_products.features: Turn the world into your office with Grasshopper, the virtual phone system for small businesses. Get a local, toll free, or vanity phone number to represent your business or bring your own number! Forward calls anywhere and use our mobile and desktop apps to communicate with clients over voice or text, be notified in real time of missed calls & voicemails, and have your voicemails transcribed and sent via email. Try us risk free for 30 days with our money-back guarantee.

similar_products.short_desc: Kixie is the sales engagement platform that boosts sales team performance with ultra-reliable, easily-automated calling & texting.
similar_products.features: Better Sales, Made Simple. Kixie is the sales engagement platform that boosts sales team performance with ultra-reliable, easily-automated calling and texting for Hubspot, SalesForce, Zoho, Pipedrive, and leading CRMs. Supercharge your CRM into an automated sales machine with intelligent autodialing, seamless CRM integration, and Enterprise phone service. Start making calls in 3 minutes with no hardware and a 100% free trial.

similar_products.short_desc: The effective, affordable, and easy-to-use VoIP solution, AVOXI. See how easy it can be when you try risk-free!
similar_products.features: With AVOXI, your VoIP phone number setup is fast and easy. There are no setup fees or minimum contracts. Every VoIP number includes 20+ features at no additional cost. Get your virtual phone number today for as low as $4.49 per month.

similar_products.short_desc:
Redefine business communication with a flexible, reliable, and cost-effective cloud
telephony system specially built for SMBs.
similar_products.features:

business calls from any device. Zoho Voice integrates with other Zoho apps, like CRM,
Desk, Recruit, and Bigin, so your teams can save time by managing calls without
switching apps. Get advanced cloud telephony features like IVRs, click-to-call, call
queues, call recording, business hours, call transfers, live call monitoring, and much
more. It's time to modernize the way you manage business calls.

similar_products.short_desc: No matter your business communication requirement, Acefone has you covered with its bespoke cloud telephony solutions.
similar_products.features: Acefone is a VoIP solution provider trusted by 10,000+ reputed companies. Expand your outreach and maximize your conversions anytime, anywhere. Truly, with Acefone, you always get the best. Start your 14-day FREE trial today.

We handle all of your system setup. Managed VoIP services from Intulse means no hassles or headaches. Friendly, available & knowledgeable live support (100% US-based). related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Audio Conferencing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Audio Conferencing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Audio Conferencing software allows multiple people to dial in and join the same audio-only call. This type of software may also include live chat, call recording, video conferencing, and other features that enable online communication between remote teams, stakeholders, and customers.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Call Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Call Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Call Accounting software helps businesses gain insights into call logs, telephone usage and cost trends. Call Accounting solutions help create accountability for telecom resources across corporate departments. They also help to eliminate vendor over-billings by automating invoice processing. Within organizations, Call Accounting software helps to identify unused telecom resources as well as to offer insight into call and cost trends. Call Accounting software is related to Telecom Expense Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Call Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Call Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Call Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer phone calls. These solutions enable better monitoring of the customer experience, workflow management and evaluation of employee performance. Whether designed for virtual or site-based locations, Call Center applications manage and catalog the process of customer calls and often allow customers to track the progress of their request via the internet. Call Center software is related to Customer Service software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IVR software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IVR tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Interactive Voice Response (IVR) software, allows call centers, help desks and other organizations to create menus which the caller can navigate using spoken commands or their telephone keys. IVR software is mainly used for systems that allow callers to select information or enter data without the need for assistance. IVR systems can also be used to route callers to the appropriate department within an organization, based on their answers to qualifying questions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Telecom Expense Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Telecom Expense Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Telecom Expense Management software automates the process of monitoring, auditing and reducing telecom billing expenses. These applications aid call centers, help desks and other organizations measure, manage, predict and optimize expenditures related to their telephone systems. Telecom Expense Management solutions also aid in distributing key performance data throughout an enterprise as well as forecasting for infrastructure investment and eliminating internal fraud. Telecom Expense Management software is related to Billing and Provisioning software and Call Accounting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Telephony software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Telephony tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Telephony software automates the electronic transmission of voice and data, often to improve call center efficiency. These applications allow all types of organizations increased flexibility in managing their incoming and outgoing call options as well as a variety of fax and data features. In addition to optimizing an organization's internal operations, Telephony software also offers expanded outgoing capabilities, providing an infrastructure for call center management, help desk operations, predictive dialing applications, Customer Relationship Management (CRM) solutions and telemarketing software.
